memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned int, unsigned int, unsigned int, unsigned int, Dealer *)
memberdef.name: Table

parameterdescription.para: The maximum number of players allowed to join the table.
Pointer to the Dealer to be assigned to this table.
Pointer to the dealer of table.

briefdescription.para: Adds a player to this table.
Adds the players to this table.

parameterdescription.para: Vector of pointers to the new players.

briefdescription.para: Removes the player described by his name.

memberdef.argsstring: (pair< short, short > xy, unsigned int userID)
memberdef.name: play

briefdescription.para: Plays Blackjack allowing humans to play against bots and other humans too.
Simulates a blackjack game for the given rounds.
Gets initial money of this table.
Ask players for their initial bets.

simplesect.para: A vector of pointers to the players in the table.

briefdescription.para: Deal one card to all players.
Pay to player a given amount.

parameterdescription.para: The value to pay to the player.

simplesect.para: 0 - deck restarted successfully; 1 - deck not ready to be restarted.

parameterdescription.para: - the coordinates to set the cursor.
Zero-based index of the player to kick.

briefdescription.para: Resets All bots of type 1 counters.

parameterdescription.para: The amount of money to be added.

briefdescription.para: Closes the table. Resets all bot counters.

simplesect.para: moneyOfTable The final money of the table that should be added to the casino.

briefdescription.para: Plays and Displays in terminal the blackjack game.
Gets the next identifier of the tables.
